title: Import Odoo Product Images from Google Drive
author: AArtIntelligent
readme:
## **Objective**

This workflow automatically imports product images from Google Drive and associates them with templates and products in Odoo.
readme_zh:
## **目标**

本工作流自动从Google Drive导入产品图片，并将其与Odoo中的模板和产品关联起来。
title_zh: 从谷歌云端硬盘导入Odoo产品图片
